course_description: This class is offered to students selected to participate in a one-week fieldwork trip to the U.N. Climate Change Negotiation as a part of Emory's delegation. The course explores interdisciplinary climate change issues from science, policy, and business perspectives.
prerequisites: ENVS 326 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2483, Section #: 1, Type: PRA, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: E. Saikawa, Status: Open
